title: Streamlining Advanced Taxi Assignment Strategies based on Legal Analysis. (arXiv:2401.12324v1 [cs.AI])
abstract: In recent years many novel applications have appeared that promote the provision of services and activities in a collaborative manner. The key idea behind such systems is to take advantage of idle or underused capacities of existing resources, in order to provide improved services that assist people in their daily tasks, with additional functionality, enhanced efficiency, and/or reduced cost. Particularly in the domain of urban transportation, many researchers have put forward novel ideas, which are then implemented and evaluated through prototypes that usually draw upon AI methods and tools. translated_title: 在法律分析基础上简化先进的出租车调度策略
translated_abstract: 近年来，出现了许多新颖的应用程序，以协作的方式促进服务和活动的提供。这种系统的关键思想是利用现有资源的闲置或低使用率，以提供改进的服务，帮助人们完成日常任务，并提供额外功能、增加效率和/或降低成本。尤其在城市交通领域，许多研究人员提出了新颖的想法，然后通过常常利用人工智能方法和工具进行原型的实现和评估。然而，这些提议也引发了多个非技术问题，如果想将这些系统应用于实际世界，就需要对其进行充分的识别和解决。尽管在实践中，与基于人工智能的系统相关的法律和伦理问题很少在研究和开发过程初期考虑，但我们认为这些问题不仅限制了设计决策，同时也制约了系统范围的扩展和实施。
tldr: 本文提出了在法律分析基础上简化先进的出租车调度策略的方法，并强调了在利用人工智能方法和工具进行原型实现时需要充分考虑法律和伦理问题。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a method to streamline advanced taxi assignment strategies based on legal analysis, highlighting the importance of considering legal and ethical issues when implementing prototypes using AI methods and tools.
